Item.Description:
FOR PARTS/NOT WORKING. PLEASE READ DESCRIPTION CAREFULLY AND ASK QUESTIONS BEFORE BIDDING! NO RETURNS! STOCK PHOTO.

Canon EOS 5D camera in good cosmetic condition. The camera will power on and take photos, but nothing displays on the LCD. I cannot access the menu or anything on the LCD. It seems as if the shutter release is constantly stuck half way. The lens will hunt for autofocus as soon as the camera is powered on. The plastic piece that holds the battery in is also loose as the spring was never put back in the right position. The battery will stay if you manually put the piece over it though. I believe the only thing that needs to be done is to fix the battery piece and to replace the shutter release button. I don't have time to send it to Canon for the repairs though, so just trying to sell it.

Comes with the original box, all cables and manuals, body, charger and Canon OEM battery.

If you have any questions, please send a message before bidding. NO RETURNS. SHIPS TO LOWER 48 STATES ONLY!
Item.Title: Canon EOS 5D 12.8 MP Digital SLR Camera - Black (Body Only)
Item.ConditionDescription: Good cosmetic condition. Mechanical issues. Please read description carefully!
